name: Layers Demo
description:
Layers is a puzzle platformer that has a unique twist. A level is made of up the 3 different layers, Green, Red and Blue. Objects in the game interact with the layer you are playing on as well as the layer that matches its outline colour. Use this interaction to solve the puzzles and get all the characters to the exit portal.

Features

  • Fully functioning level editor (not included in the demo)
  • Planned Steam Workshop support to share and play countless levels
  • Carefully planned puzzles
  • Unique gameplay and concept
